where.label: wr1
where.expression: sizeof ( query ( sar <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'shape_aspect_relationship.related_shape_aspect' ) | sar \ shape_aspect_relationship . name = 'terminal to be altered' ) ) = 1

where.label: wr2
where.expression: ( self . of_shape . definition \ product_definition . description = 'altered package' )

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ( sizeof ( query ( pd <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition.definition' ) | not ( sizeof ( query ( pdr <* usedin ( pd , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition_representation.definition' ) | sizeof ( query ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | sizeof ( [ 'altered_package_mim.' + 'measure_representation_item' , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'length_measure_with_unit' ] * typeof ( it ) ) = 2 ) ) = 2 ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: wr2
where.expression: ( sizeof ( query ( pd <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition.definition' ) | not ( sizeof ( query ( pdr <* usedin ( pd , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition_representation.definition' ) | sizeof ( query ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | ( sizeof ( [ 'altered_package_mim.' + 'measure_representation_item' , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'length_measure_with_unit' ] * typeof ( it ) ) = 2 ) and ( it \ representation_item . name = 'maximum trimmed length' ) ) ) = 1 ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: wr3
where.expression: ( sizeof ( query ( pd <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition.definition' ) | not ( sizeof ( query ( pdr <* usedin ( pd , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'property_definition_representation.definition' ) | sizeof ( query ( it <* pdr . used_representation . items | ( sizeof ( [ 'altered_package_mim.' + 'measure_representation_item' , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'length_measure_with_unit' ] * typeof ( it ) ) = 2 ) and ( it \ representation_item . name = 'minimum trimmed length' ) ) ) = 1 ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0 )

where.label: wr1
where.expression: ( sizeof ( query ( ada <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'applied_document_reference.items' ) | ( 'altered_package_mim.' + 'ee_specification' in typeof ( ada . assigned_document ) ) and ( ada . assigned_document . kind \ document_type . product_data_type = 'lead form specification' ) and ( sizeof ( query ( dr <* usedin ( ada . assigned_document , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'document_relationship.related_document' ) | dr . relating_document . kind \ document_type . product_data_type = 'material specification' ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 1 )

where.label: wr2
where.expression: ( sizeof ( query ( ada <* usedin ( self , 'altered_package_mim.' + 'applied_document_reference.items' ) | ( 'altered_package_mim.' + 'ee_specification' in typeof ( ada . assigned_document ) ) and ( ada . assigned_document . kind \ document_type . product_data_type = 'surface finish specification' ) ) ) = 1 )
